entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 06 at 3:28PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...A STORM FORCE LOW FOR MID WEEK... A strong low over the Gulf of Alaska will bring a storm force front to the panhandle for the middle of the week. This system will bring increased winds along the outer coast. Wind gusts could range from 40 to 60 mph. Forecast guidance today continues to show a strong front impacting the area Wednesday morning to
entry.cap:areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Yakutat; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued November 07 at 8:53AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...PM-10 HIGH POLLUTION ADVISORY FOR THE YUMA AREA WEDNESDAY... The Arizona Department of Environmental Quality (ADEQ) has issued a PM-10 High Pollution Advisory for the Yuma area on Wednesday. An episode of strong and gusty winds is forecast to generate widespread blowing dust that may result in local PM-10 concentrations that pose a health risk. Adverse health effects

entry.summary: ...Periods of snow continuing today... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Periods of snow. An additional 1 to 3 inches of accumulation expected. * WHERE...Wind River Range.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 07 at 6:43AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Periods of snow continuing today... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Periods of snow. Additional accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Salt and Wyoming Range.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 07 at 6:43AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snow showers today... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Snow showers today. Locally accumulations of an inch or two. * WHERE...Sweetwater County.
entry.cap:areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
